metadata.title: CVE-2017-6430 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The compile_tree function in ef_compiler.c in the Etterfilter utility inEttercap 0.8.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted filter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6430` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.2-2ubuntu1.16.04.1
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.2-2ubuntu1.16.04.1
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.2-2ubuntu1.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.2-2ubuntu1.16.04.1').
